CustomField.formula:
IF( MONTH( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))<2, (TEXT(Year( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))-1) + " - " + CASE(MONTH( DATEVALUE( CreatedDate )),
1,'Q4', 2,'Q1', 3,'Q1', 4,'Q1', 5,'Q2', 6,'Q2', 7,'Q2', 8,'Q3', 9,'Q3', 10,'Q3', 11,'Q4', 12,'Q4', NULL)),
(TEXT(Year( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))) + " - " + CASE(MONTH( DATEVALUE( CreatedDate )),
1,'Q4', 2,'Q1', 3,'Q1', 4,'Q1', 5,'Q2', 6,'Q2', 7,'Q2', 8,'Q3', 9,'Q3', 10,'Q3', 11,'Q4', 12,'Q4', NULL)))
CustomField.label: Fiscal Period Created
